        <general>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Newtons 3rd Law: Action-Reaction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Newton-3. Gesetz: Tätigkeit-Reaktion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">3ème Loi de Newton : Action-Réaction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lei Dos Newtons Ó: Ação-Reação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Terza Legge Di Newton: Azione-Reazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">3$ος νόμος Newtons: Ενέργεια-αντίδραση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">3ro Ley De los Neutonios: Accio'n-Reaccio'n</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which demonstrates Newtons 3rd Law of action-reaction, using a baloon and a rocket.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Physics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mechanics</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation, die Newton-3. Gesetz der 
Tätigkeit-Reaktion mit einem baloon und einer Rakete zeigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation qui démontre la 3ème loi de newton
de l'action-réaction, à l'aide d'un baloon et d'une fusée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que demonstre lei dos newtons a ó da
ação-reação, usando um baloon e um foguete.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione che dimostra la terza legge di 
Newton di azione-reazione, per mezzo di un baloon e di un razzo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα που καταδεικνύει τον 3$ο νόμο Newtons
της ενέργεια-αντίδρασης, χρησιμοποιώντας ένα baloon και έναν 
πύραυλο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que demuestra la 3ro ley de los 
neutonios de la accio'n-reaccio'n, usando un baloon y un cohete.</string>
          </description>
